sub_concepts.name: Reactants
sub_concepts.definition: Substances that undergo a chemical change in a reaction.

sub_concepts.name: Products
sub_concepts.definition: Substances formed as a result of a chemical reaction.

sub_concepts.name: Catalysts
sub_concepts.definition: Substances that increase the rate of a chemical reaction without being consumed in the process.

sub_concepts.name: Equilibrium
sub_concepts.definition: A state in which the rate of the forward reaction equals the rate of the reverse reaction.

sub_concepts.name: Exothermic Reaction
sub_concepts.definition: A reaction that releases heat energy to its surroundings.

sub_concepts.name: Endothermic Reaction
sub_concepts.definition: A reaction that absorbs heat energy from its surroundings.
